description: A vertical box plot showing median, min, and max gross square feet.

tooltip.signal: {"Max of Price": format(datum["upper_whisker_price"], ""), "Q3 of Price": format(datum["upper_box_price"], ""), "Median of Price": format(datum["mid_box_price"], ""), "Q1 of Price": format(datum["lower_box_price"], ""), "Min of Price": format(datum["lower_whisker_price"], ""), "Borough": isValid(datum["borough"]) ? datum["borough"] : ""+datum["borough"], "borough": isValid(datum["borough"]) ? datum["borough"] : ""+datum["borough"]}
